content.raw: Oooof, that's an interesting dilemma. If this is only occurring in `ign-msgs`, I guess we should just go ahead and add `target_compile_options(${PROJECT_LIBRARY_TARGET_NAME} -Wno-switch-default)` into `ign-msgs/src/CMakeLists.txt`. It's an unfortunate workaround, since it will also suppress any cases where we leave out the `default` in our own `ign-msgs` code, but I can't think of a better short-term solution. The long-term solution would probably be to report an issue and/or make a pull request to `protobuf` :sweat_smile:
